>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
..[0] Arbitration Council (Kh.), case no. 123/09, October 2, 2009.
..[1] <i>Some Book</i>, n.d.
>>[2] Case no. 123/09, October 2, 2009.
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1"
                }
             ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ],

            "citationID": "CITATION-2",

                    "id": "ITEM-2"
                }
             ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 2
            }
        }, 
        [["CITATION-1",1]], 
        []
    ],
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-3", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1"
                }
             ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 3
            }
        }, 
        [["CITATION-1",1],["CITATION-2",2]], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
mlz-cms-full.csl
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== ABBREVIATIONS =====>>
{
   "default": {
        "place":{
           "kh": "Kh."
        }
   }
}
<<===== ABBREVIATIONS =====<<



>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "title": "Whamo Corporation",
        "authority": "Arbitration Council",
        "jurisdiction": "kh",
        "number": "123/09",
        "issued": {
            "date-parts": [[2009, 10, 2]]
        },
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "legal_case"
    }, 
    {
        "title": "Some Book",
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
